description: Handles user authentication including registration, login, password reset, and social login.
Manages player interactions such as searching, filtering, joining matches, tracking stats, and reporting issues.
Supports team organizers in creating and managing matches, inviting players, and assigning referees.
Allows referees to find matches to officiate, manage assignments, update results, and report misconduct.
Manages user profiles, support requests, and issue reports for both players and referees.
Handles match scheduling, participation, and record management. Will use a database in the future.
